params.comment: Character Combat AI
角色战斗AI
Following state
跟随玩家状态
If the current character is controlled by the player
如果当前角色被玩家控制
If the current character is controlled by the computer
如果当前角色被电脑控制
If the target is found, enter combat state
如果发现目标，则进入战斗状态
Combat state
战斗状态
If the current character is controlled by a player
如果当前角色被玩家控制
If the character is in an unconscious state
如果角色处于昏迷状态
If the current character is too far away from the player character, forced to disengage from the battle
如果当前角色跟玩家角色的距离太远，强制脱战
Obtain hostile targets
获取敌对目标
If the target is in range of the attack
如果目标在攻击范围内
Casting a skill at regular intervals
每隔一段时间施放一个技能
Casting a normal attack
施放普通攻击
如果距离太远，先接近目标
Returning state
返回状态

角色战斗AI
Following state
跟随玩家状态
If the current character is controlled by the player

如果角色处于昏迷状态，返回

attributes.value: 我果然是被选中的人，是时候去拯救世界了！

params.comment: Increases the maximum life value and scales the current life value
增加最大生命值，按比例调整当前生命值
Increases the maximum magic value and scales the current magic value
增加最大魔法值，按比例调整当前魔法值
Increase physical attack, physical defense, magic attack, magic defense, life recovery speed, magic recovery speed
增加物理攻击、物理防御、魔法攻击、魔法防御、生命恢复速度、魔法恢复速度
Increase blast rate, evasion rate, life steal, attack speed, movement speed, skill cooldown reduction, keep 2 decimal places
增加暴击率、闪避率、生命偷取、攻击速度、移动速度、技能冷却缩减，保留2位小数
Reduces maximum life value and scales current life value
减少最大生命值，按比例调整当前生命值
Reduces the maximum magic value and scales the current magic value
减少最大魔法值，按比例调整当前魔法值
Reduces physical attack, physical defense, magic attack, magic defense, life recovery speed, magic recovery speed
减少物理攻击、物理防御、魔法攻击、魔法防御、生命恢复速度、魔法恢复速度
Reduces blast rate, evasion rate, life steal, attack speed, movement speed, skill cooldown reduction, retaining 2 decimal places
减少暴击率、闪避率、生命偷取、攻击速度、移动速度、技能冷却缩减，保留2位小数
Get the GCD corresponding to the item's cooldown key (items with the same cooldown key share cooldown progress)
获取物品冷却键对应的GCD(相同冷却键的物品共享冷却进度)
If the item has not finished cooling, stop the event
如果物品冷却未结束，停止事件
If the item is not on cooldown, set the cooldown time of the item
如果物品不在冷却状态中，设置物品的冷却时间

Place party members to the player's side
放置队友角色到玩家身边
Get the display text mode {dialog,chat}(default: dialog)
获取显示文本模式{dialog,chat}(默认值：dialog)
Can only be controlled when the player character is alive
只有玩家角色存活时才可以控制
Can only be controlled when the player character is alive
只有玩家角色存活时才可以控制
Move player actor
移动玩家角色
The shortcut bar may be empty, or it may be a skill or an item, execute both commands
快捷栏中可能是空的，也可能是技能或物品，两个指令都执行一下
快捷栏中可能是空的，也可能是技能或物品，两个指令都执行一下
Can only be controlled when the player character is alive and not unconscious
只有玩家角色存活并且未昏迷时才可以控制
If no character is found to talk to, an animated pointer is displayed at the mouse click location and moves to the target location
如果未找到可以对话的角色，在鼠标点击位置显示一个动画指针，并移动到目标位置
Scroll wheel increment < 0 means slide up to zoom in on the scene screen
滚轮增量<0表示向上滑动，放大场景画面
Scroll wheel increment > 0 means slide down to narrow the scene screen
滚轮增量>0表示向下滑动，缩小场景画面
If all party members die, game over
如果队伍成员全部死亡，游戏结束
Set character level cap
设置角色等级上限

设置下一级所需经验值
Full restoration of character status
完全恢复角色状态

获取敌对目标，如果没有目标就重置
If the target is in range of the attack
如果目标在攻击范围内
Casting a normal attack
施放普通攻击
If the distance is too far, approach the target first
如果距离太远，先接近目标
Returning state
返回状态
升级成功时减少经验值，满级时限制经验值
Set the duration of the summon
设置召唤持续时间
Following state
跟随主人状态
If the target is found, enter combat state
如果发现目标，则进入战斗状态
Combat state
战斗状态
If the character is in an unconscious state
如果角色处于昏迷状态
If the current character is too far away from the summoner, force to disengage from the battle
如果当前角色跟召唤师的距离太远，强制脱战
Obtain hostile targets
获取敌对目标
If the target is in range of the attack
如果目标在攻击范围内
Casting a normal attack
施放普通攻击
If the distance is too far, approach the target first
如果距离太远，先接近目标
Returning state
返回状态
Determine if a hit has been made
命中判定
1234 corresponds to the four MISS characters
1234对应MISS四个字符
Determine if a critical strike is triggered
暴击判定
Critical damage multiplier: 2x
暴击伤害倍率：2倍
Set minimum damage value
设置最低伤害值
Increases the threat value by an amount equal to the damage value
增加与伤害值等量的仇恨值
Handle damage
伤害处理
Steal HP
偷取生命
If restore HP >= 1, pop up floating number
如果恢复生命值 >=1，弹出浮动数字
如果角色生命值 <= 0，则判定死亡
因为角色取消激活后，将不会继续执行后面的指令，所以放到独立执行块中来完成指令
Stop moving, turn off collision function, cancel activation (death)
停止移动，关闭碰撞功能，取消激活(死亡)
Wait for the end of the character death animation, if there is no resurrection, delete the character
等待角色死亡动画播放结束，如果没有复活，删除角色
If the skill is set to stun time, let the character without the endure state to get a layer of stun state, wait for a period of time to lift
如果技能设置了昏迷时间，让没有霸体状态的角色获得一层昏迷状态，等待一段时间后解除
This event needs to be used with the drop item plugin
This event will be called automatically when a dropped item touches the player's character
FBI警告：本事件需要配合掉落物品插件一起使用
掉落物品在触碰玩家角色时，将会自动调用本事件
If it's gold (special item), increase the amount of money the player has
如果是金币(特殊物品)，增加玩家的金钱数量
Show the message of getting gold coins in the message bar
在信息栏显示获得金币的消息
If it is another item, increase the number of such items in the player's package
如果是其他物品，增加玩家包裹中这种物品的数量
If the item name is set, show the message of getting the item in the message bar
如果设置了物品名字，在信息栏显示获得物品的消息
If it is equipment, put this equipment into the player package
如果是装备，将这个装备放入玩家包裹
If the name of the equipment is set, the message of obtaining the equipment is displayed in the message bar
如果设置了装备名字，在信息栏显示获得装备的消息
Shared function: Calculate the color index of the item name (using the index color is convenient to modify the color later)
共享函数: 计算物品名字的颜色索引(使用索引色方便以后修改颜色)
用于调试功能的事件指令
只作为读取变量值，不更改变量值
单击按钮后，变量值变化，重新循环
单击按钮后，变量值变化，重新循环
Deleting the event host does not continue the execution and puts it in a separate execution block to ensure completion
删除事件宿主后就不会继续执行，放到独立执行块中保证完成
Deleting the event host does not continue the execution and puts it in a separate execution block to ensure completion
删除事件宿主后就不会继续执行，放到独立执行块中保证完成
Deleting the event host does not continue the execution and puts it in a separate execution block to ensure completion
删除事件宿主后就不会继续执行，放到独立执行块中保证完成

children.name: 对话内容
children.content:
啊！頭好痛呀！是不是最近Ｋ書Ｋ太兇了，所以有點恍惚了
...我記得我正在玩“金庸群俠傳”啊！怎麽突然就睡著了？
管他的，我得趕緊起來玩，這游戲可是等了半年多才玩到的，非第一個破關不可。咦！我的電腦呢？

params.comment: No dialogue content, skip
不存在对话内容，跳过

nodes.name: 文本区域计算器
nodes.content: 用来测量文本区域宽高的元素

params.comment: Adjust the window height when inserting this element into the message window
将本元素插入到消息窗口时，调整窗口高度
Wait for a while and delete this element after the fade
等待一段时间，渐变后删除本元素
Adjusts the window height when this element is removed from the message window
将本元素从消息窗口移除时，调整窗口高度
